title: Dev returns 404 instead of 422 when ValueSet not found for $expand
notes: Prod returns HTTP 422 with issue code 'unknown' and details.text. Dev returns HTTP 404 with issue code 'not-found' and diagnostics. Exact same pattern as described in the bug.

title: Dev returns 400 instead of 422 for error responses across validate-code and expand operations
notes: Prod returns HTTP 422 for validate-code error (ValueSet not found). Dev returns HTTP 400 for the same error. Both return OperationOutcome with matching error semantics (issue code 'not-found', same details text). Status code difference is exactly as described.

title: Dev returns result=false for valid v3 terminology codes in ValueSet $validate-code
notes: Tested consent-category ValueSet with code INFA from v3-ActCode. Prod returns result=true, dev returns result=false. The v3 hierarchy resolution bug (subsumedBy property not matched by URI) still causes dev to miss descendant codes.

title: Dev loads different versions of HL7 terminology CodeSystems (terminology.hl7.org) than prod
notes: Two manifestations confirmed: (1) v3-TribalEntityUS ValueSet version is 4.0.0 on prod vs 2018-08-12 on dev, with different name/title/date metadata. (2) observation-category CodeSystem version is 4.0.1 on prod vs 2.0.0 on dev. The version skew pattern persists across multiple HL7 terminology resources.

title: Dev returns only root concept for v3 hierarchical ValueSets (missing child codes)
notes: Expanded v3-PurposeOfUse ValueSet. Prod returns total=63 with 63 codes (root + 62 descendants). Dev returns total=1 with only the root abstract concept. Dev still fails to resolve the subsumedBy-based hierarchy in v3 CodeSystems.

title: Dev: missing valueset-unclosed extension and spurious expansion.total on incomplete expansions
notes: SNOMED CT is-a 404684003 expand with count=1000. Prod returns 1000 codes with valueset-unclosed=true extension and no total. Dev returns 1000 codes with total=124412 and no unclosed extension. Both patterns (missing unclosed, spurious total) still co-occur exactly as described.

title: Dev adds expression field on informational OperationOutcome issues where prod omits it
notes: CodeSystem/$validate-code for UCUM code=TEST. Prod's informational issue has no expression field (null). Dev's informational issue has expression=['code']. The extra expression field on info-severity issues is still present.

title: Dev returns extra message/issues for display language resolution on validate-code result=true
notes: POST validate-code for iso:3166 code FR with displayLanguage=fr. Both return result=true. Prod has no message parameter. Dev returns extra message: 'There are no valid display names found for the code urn:iso:std:iso:3166#FR for language(s) fr'. Dev still emits the spurious display-not-found informational message that prod omits.
